name: create-a-ticket
title: Create a ticket
description: Creates a ticket on Starko ONE
author: starko00

commands.name: create-issue-ticket
commands.title: Create Issue/Ticket
commands.subtitle: Add a new issue
commands.description: Creates a new issue in your Starko ONE workspace

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
